quotes.quote: Now to escape involves not just running away, but arriving somewhere.
Escape is a commodity like anything else.
What you cannot escape, you must fight; what you cannot fight, you must endure.
He left because the world is not made to accommodate people like him.
Once you get away from wanting to get paid, you can actually say some true things
Get away from the crowd when you can. Keep yourself to yourself, if only for a few hours daily.
To run away from trouble is a form of cowardice and, while it is true that the suicide braves death, he does it not for some noble object but to escape some ill.
If you should escape the censure of others, hope not to escape your own.
No one gets away with evil. Judgment always comes, only the timing is uncertain.
Let's get away from all the clever humans who put words in our mouth let's only say what our hearts desire.
The secret to getting away with lying, is believing with all your heart. That goes for lying to yourself even more so than lying to another.
To get away from one's working environment is, in a sense, to get away from one's self; and this is often the chief advantage of travel and change.
You don't need to know what you're escaping from to become a fugitive.
You can't escape what you are, but you also should know what you could be. Why you're fighting.
You can't get away from yourself by moving from one place to another.
Reality is what you can get away with.
You can never really get away you can only take yourself somewhere else.
You can get away with saying much more with humor than you can with a straight face.
To escape from the world means that one's mind is not concerned with the opinions of the world.
To escape death, she'd become death.
Good posture and an attitude let you get away with anything.
Sometimes you need to get away for a few weeks just to figure out who you are again.
Escape is not a dirty word. None of us can face what's happening head-on all of the time.
They're on our right, they're on our left, they're in front of us, they're behind us; they can't get away from us this time.

Best way to get away from negative feelings and emotions is to involve ourselves without getting involved. It comes by practice and is beneficial for our health; be it physical, mental, emotional or spiritual.
You have to escape from management land and get in touch with your people.
Nobody ever did, or ever will, escape the consequences of his choices.
No one can escape life's pain. That's life.
Your fears never go away. You just get more comfortable ignoring them.
To get away well is so very much! And to get away well is often so very difficult!
We must escape our illusions of correctness to understand the actions and beliefs of others.
You can get away with stuff in a one-page story that you can't get away with in a book.
Once you get away from where you're from, you look at it in a different way.
Escape from boredom is one of the really powerful desires of almost all human beings.
You cannot escape necessities, but you can overcome them.
You can't escape moral judgment through a legal loop hole.
If you get far enough away you'll be on your way back home.
A man trying to escape never thinks himself sufficiently concealed.
Anybody who gets away with something will come back to get away with a little bit more.
We all try to escape pain and death, while we seek what is pleasant.
Powerful people get away with things. That's one way to demonstrate their difference from the rest of us.
No matter how far you travel, you can never get away from yourself.
Just because you escape one trap, doesn't mean you will escape the next.
We're all running away. Some of us just don't get very far.
You cannot escape the responsibility of tomorrow by evading it today.
You're trying to escape from your difficulties, and there never is any escape from difficulties, never. They have to be faced and fought.
You can get away with anything as long as it works.
The further you get away from yourself, the more challenging it is. Not to be in your comfort zone is great fun.

Life will let you get away with something for a while, but sooner or later, you will pay the price. Everything you do in life causes the effects that you experience. When you get the bill, be prepared to pay.
Tell everyone that your mistakes are art. You can get away with a lot that way.
